text:
:loudspeaker: *Full Stack Engineer Seeking Full-Time Permanent Role*
:wave: Hi everyone! I'm Sunil Singh, a highly skilled *Full Stack Engineer* with extensive experience in both *frontend and backend development*. I have a strong track record of delivering *scalable, commercially viable digital solutions* and leading teams to success.
:small_blue_diamond: *Experience:* 10+ years in web development, working with agencies and enterprises.
:small_blue_diamond: *Tech Stack:*
• *Frontend:* React, Next.js, JavaScript (ES6+), Tailwind, Bootstrap
• *Backend:* PHP (Laravel, WordPress, Drupal), Python (Django, FastAPI), Node.js
• *CMS:* WordPress (ACF PRO, Gutenberg), Drupal, Shopify, HubSpot
• *Databases:* MySQL, PostgreSQL, Firebase, MongoDB
• *Cloud & DevOps:* AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD Pipelines
• *AI & ML:* TensorFlow, PyTorch, NLP, GPT Models
:dart: *Looking For:* A *full-time permanent role* in web or software development, preferably in *Sydney (open to remote/hybrid roles)*.
:briefcase: *Previous Clients:* Nuix, Barnardo’s Australia, NSW Government, Coca-Cola, Mitsubishi Electric, and more.
If you know of any opportunities that fit, I’d love to connect! Feel free to DM me or reach out at *<mailto:sunilsingh2019@gmail.com|sunilsingh2019@gmail.com>*.
Thanks in advance! :rocket:
